items.title: Rethinking Research: Private GPTs for Investment Analysis
items.description: This chatbot-style tool allows investment analysts to query complex research materials in plain language without ever exposing sensitive data.

items.title: Mind the Inflation Gap: Hedging with Real Assets
items.description: Timely insights on portfolio risk, inflation hedging, and market cycles—grounded in financial history and written for investment decision-makers.

items.title: Book Review: Cheaper Faster Better: How We’ll Win the Climate War
items.description: Can capitalism save the planet? Tom Steyer makes the case in this urgent, optimistic roadmap to a net-zero future.

items.title: Buyers Beware: 7 Red Flags That Signal a Private Market Reckoning
items.description: Explore red flags in private markets as speculative excess, retail marketing, and valuation risks mount. Lessons from financial history.

items.title: Fed Independence Tested, but Investors Shouldn’t Expect a Pivot
